layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 216x26

                text run at (1,1) width 210: "This table should NOT be visible"
